devdoc.details: Base escrow contract for Hero loan tokens, holds funds designated for a loan until they withdraw them or they are put into a succesful loan.

deposit(address).details: Stores the sent amount as credit to be withdrawn.

params.payee: The destination address of the funds.

transferPrimary(address).details: Transfers contract to a new primary.

params.payee: The address whose funds will be withdrawn and transferred to.

withdrawToContract(address,uint256).details: Move balances to the owner for use for loans.

params.payee: The address whose funds will be withdrawn and transferred to the primary contract.

devdoc.title: Escrow
